title: Fivestar4everMVP
author: Fivestar4everMVP
created_time: November 17, 2023, 08:56:29 AMLast edit: November 17, 2023, 07:51:39 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
content: I honestly do not know if we've had a discussion like this before on this board, but this is based on my personal experience while playing on L0tt0.com last night, I was just so close to hitting a x1000 while I was playing pick six game, which would have multiplied my initial bet amount by 1000 times.But unfortunately, I ended up with a mere x10 because the numbers didn't align well.Here is the shot below.As you guys can see on the shot, I placed a bet on 490082, and the system played 480088, and according to the information in the shot below..If my second number, which is 9, was also the same number the system played, it means that five of my numbers out of six, would have played and I would have made x1000, which Is the second to the highest jackpot being x2500.It was a very close one for me, and I did spend more than 20 minutes staring at the outcome of this game, and wondering why just one single number had to spoil what would have been a jackpot win for men, and I did x10, instead of x1000  .Lets discuss guys, how close have you ever been to winning a big about of money, a jackpot, maybe in sports betting or lotto, or any other game that has to do with numbers, online or offline, how close have you ever been to winning a big amount, and what was it that spoilt the win for you.?

comments.author: 0t3p0t
comments.body: QuoteLets discuss guys, how close have you ever been to winning a big about of money, a jackpot, maybe in sports betting or lotto, or any other game that has to do with numbers, online or offline, how close have you ever been to winning a big amount, and what was it that spoilt the win for you.?Not even close. I have tried this in a lotto outlest here in my place but winning the jackpot is really far from happening. I have been buying tickets for I think like 2 years before but the jackpot is so elusive. I don't know if I had to try to buy tickets again but this depends on my budget. Your ticket combinations are good and is close to winning the jackpot, I wonder if those combinations has significance to you or just random numbers?

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 17, 2023, 08:56:29 AMLets discuss guys, how close have you ever been to winning a big about of money, a jackpot, maybe in sports betting or lotto, or any other game that has to do with numbers, online or offline, how close have you ever been to winning a big amount, and what was it that spoilt the win for you.?It happens to me 4 years ago I was one number away from winning over $10 million in our currency on lottery, actually, I was the missing number in my mind but I decided to take another number, my life could have changed if I had picked the original number but the second prize is still good I manage to add it to the grocery store. Every time I think about it, I just laugh at it, if it's for you, you're going to hit it, maybe in the future I'll hit the jackpot but from now on I will always stick to the number I think of, or better get another ticket where all your original is included, so you'll have no regret later.

comments.author: Marvelman
comments.body: Oh man, that must've been such a rush almost hitting that x1000 multiplier! I bet your emotions were all over the place.  I hate when that happens in games, like when everything lines up just right but then fate pulls the rug out from under you at the last second.  Sucks and  big wins in gambling seem to come down to sheer luck and perfect timing.  I've had some close calls playing slots too but never on that kind of scale.  The stars really have to align to hit a jackpot.  I'm too skeptical about lotto games to play them much because the odds are so astronomically against you.  But hey, someone's gotta win eventually right? Maybe next time that x1000 multiplier will hit for you! You can't win if you dont play.

comments.author: angrybirdy
comments.body: Quote from: 0t3p0t on November 17, 2023, 09:23:52 AMQuoteLets discuss guys, how close have you ever been to winning a big about of money, a jackpot, maybe in sports betting or lotto, or any other game that has to do with numbers, online or offline, how close have you ever been to winning a big amount, and what was it that spoilt the win for you.?Not even close. I have tried this in a lotto outlest here in my place but winning the jackpot is really far from happening. I have been buying tickets for I think like 2 years before but the jackpot is so elusive. I don't know if I had to try to buy tickets again but this depends on my budget. Your ticket combinations are good and is close to winning the jackpot, I wonder if those combinations has significance to you or just random numbers?I remember a couple of years ago, We were so close in winning the Mega Jackpot prize in a Lotto outlet here in our country because all 6 digits combination numbers was picked, but on that day, we didn't bet on the lottery and it was one of our regrettable time. The Mega jackpot prize is worth $576,727. The winning numbers that day is my families combination number since then and we always use those number when we have a time on buying lotto ticket.

comments.author: dunfida
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 17, 2023, 08:56:29 AMLets discuss guys, how close have you ever been to winning a big about of money, a jackpot, maybe in sports betting or lotto, or any other game that has to do with numbers, online or offline, how close have you ever been to winning a big amount, and what was it that spoilt the win for you.?Im not really that a fan on making some bets or buying tickets online or betting on lotteries but i do have some experience on offline sweepstakes or lottery on which i did bought some tickets for almost 2 months.I have never been able to get some hit on getting 4 digits at least so far on which i have that stopped on make betting knowing that odds of winning is really that close to impossible.Yes, the price per ticket wont really be that much or something that it is really that cheap but its something that could bring out some stress everytime that you wont really be hitting up the jackpot.I dont know if its just me on where i do get irritated or get pissed whenever i do miss out that combination. lolBasing up on what you had shared here op, hitting that 1000x almost? that do really give out that kind of annoyance for a certain period but since you areonly betting small amount then it wont hurt but you are already imagining on hitting that multiplier which would really be giving that kind of boost up.Try next and you might be able to hit it up but dont expect knowing odds is always been that too close to impossible.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: I was really unlucky in the lottery, not even hitting 4 numbers out of 6. I could just dream about it at least hitting almost is a big factor to say that we are not unlucky for this and maybe the time has come to hit the jackpot. But for me, I was hopeless then, it looked like winning the jackpot prize was quite hard and I had to say to myself that if I continued doing this I could surely lose more. I've been in sports betting and this a great place for me as I was a fan of sports.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: In spotbetting, I was lose to winning big with a long slip which would have been a life changer for me but you know how this long slip game do end. The last game was the game that cut my slop. The game was played for one week and all the games came out as predicted, which gave me more confidence that I have won but unlucky for me the last game stole my win from me.I couldn't eat and I was very upset on my greed because I was called by the bet agent to cash out, which I told them that I am winning the huge sum of money and they should make arrangement for my funds. This happened last year and it is still fresh in my memory. I don't play lotto, so i don't have any experience on it.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: That must have been a rollercoaster of emotions. it's tough when you come so close to a big win, only to have it slip through your fingers because of one number. I can imagine the excitement and frustration that comes with being just a hair's breadth away from a life-changing win. It's those moments that keep us coming back, isn't it? The thrill of the possibility. Anyway, here's to hoping that your next round brings you the jackpot you've been eyeing. Sometimes it's the near-misses that make the eventual win all the more sweet. Best of luck in your future games!In my various experiences with different types of gambling, whether online or offline, in provably fair games like dice, I thought and hoped that I could recover the losses and win big before my session ends or before my bankroll is depleted. Unfortunately, luck did not favor me, even though my bankroll was somewhat significant for me, considering that I rarely have such a large bankroll. As for scratch cards, there were moments when I thought I would hit the jackpot with the remaining scratches, but it turned out not to be the case. Fortunately, I didn't have high expectations.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Never won any before, but been close to winning is still an anticipation. However, I've been close to friends who won loads of bets and it's actually part of the triggers that got me involved in gambling. I consider winning a 'luck' but you have to be guided, with the winners I got around me, I'm hoping to win anytime soon but I'm very careful not to get addicted to gambling.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: 0t3p0t on November 17, 2023, 09:23:52 AMQuoteLets discuss guys, how close have you ever been to winning a big about of money, a jackpot, maybe in sports betting or lotto, or any other game that has to do with numbers, online or offline, how close have you ever been to winning a big amount, and what was it that spoilt the win for you.?Not even close. I have tried this in a lotto outlest here in my place but winning the jackpot is really far from happening. I have been buying tickets for I think like 2 years before but the jackpot is so elusive. I don't know if I had to try to buy tickets again but this depends on my budget. Your ticket combinations are good and is close to winning the jackpot, I wonder if those combinations has significance to you or just random numbers?Same situation since its so hard to win on lotto even closest on that since there are so many numbers and provability to win is so low. I win some small amount but it can't cover up my losses on lottery but still decided to bet since who knows right? One of these days we are the one who can spot the jackpot and became a instant millionaire. Although its far to happen but since we are consistent to place some bets while the jackpot price became more bigger and bigger then there's so slim hope that we can win that prize.I don't have any significant number but next time maybe will bring some numbers that provably used for long time since I think if you use that numbers for long time then there's a chance that you can win some amount on lottery. Let see what will happen if luck will came then this will be good to us.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: I have had some big misses too in soccer bets. I think that was about three years ago where a game became the hard luck for me in two different bet slips. That match appeared in both slip and it was the last match that winning it would have been a big testimony for me but behold at FT, the slips were red indicating loses. Since then I avoided playing same option for the same match.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: I got x1000 one time at the tome of life in a three liner, and twice in Plinko, but the only problem is I spent half of my capital before I reached that big hit. So, you won't even feel that you really hit x1000 after that.That same way happens over and over again sometimes I am near losing almost x1000 before I get that kind of multi-win. Never had that one chance where I would receive that multi-win in an early 100 bets or so. So, I cannot say I am close enough to that jackpot that I wanted for a long time because I never had it as early as possible for me to get out and withdraw the money. Most of the time it will take hours and with small bets it sometimes gets tiring to wait for it.

comments.author: angrybirdy
comments.body: Quote from: wallet4bitcoin on November 17, 2023, 12:06:11 PMNever won any before, but been close to winning is still an anticipation. However, I've been close to friends who won loads of bets and it's actually part of the triggers that got me involved in gambling. I consider winning a 'luck' but you have to be guided, with the winners I got around me, I'm hoping to win anytime soon but I'm very careful not to get addicted to gambling.I realized that I have the same situation like yours, I rarely won in gambling activities but I've been so close in winning, so I guess I'm not that lucky when it comes to gambling activity, but I'm winning in a raffle so many times wherein there's no money/payment is involve, like totally winning for free. even though I rarely win, I'm still playing out of fun when I have my free time, So that I don't get obsessed with playing it.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 17, 2023, 08:56:29 AMLets discuss guys, how close have you ever been to winning a big about of money, a jackpot, maybe in sports betting or lotto, or any other game that has to do with numbers, online or offline, how close have you ever been to winning a big amount, and what was it that spoilt the win for you.?Mine is very different it's not about the numbers but it's more about the minutes I have a set of numbers that I've betting for the last five months I dreamed these numbers and I thought to bet on it so I bet for five months, then one day I have overtime and when I arrived in the betting station I was late by two minutes the cashier close the betting because they have a rule that they have to close the betting a few hours before the betting and it happened that the numbers I've been betting show up and I was late by two minutes.I couldn't sleep the whole two weeks but I soon moved from that it's no use thinking of that, it's not really for me, maybe in the future numbers will show up in my dreams again but this time I will not be late again.

comments.author: komisariatku
comments.body: Quote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 17, 2023, 08:56:29 AM~snip~Unfortunately I have never played the lottery and have never played in the lotto, I have seen your discussion with the lotto owner about how winnings are calculated and how that number would be a win of x10 or x1000. I see that the chance of winning x1000 or x2500 is very smallQuote from: dewez on November 06, 2023, 06:53:00 PMso if you want odds based off 0-100 percent its:2500x - 0.0001%1000x - 0.0009%Keep chasing! I'm also confused about how to guess the correct number. If I may ask, what is the minimum bet to play lottery? Maybe if we play with small bets we can guess the lottery more so the chance of winning x1000 is bigger

comments.author: dewez
comments.body: Quote from: komisariatku on November 17, 2023, 02:24:50 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 17, 2023, 08:56:29 AM~snip~Unfortunately I have never played the lottery and have never played in the lotto, I have seen your discussion with the lotto owner about how winnings are calculated and how that number would be a win of x10 or x1000. I see that the chance of winning x1000 or x2500 is very smallQuote from: dewez on November 06, 2023, 06:53:00 PMso if you want odds based off 0-100 percent its:2500x - 0.0001%1000x - 0.0009%Keep chasing! I'm also confused about how to guess the correct number. If I may ask, what is the minimum bet to play lottery? Maybe if we play with small bets we can guess the lottery more so the chance of winning x1000 is biggerHey komisariatku!So just so everyone is clear- the game Fivestar4ever is talking about is Pick-Six on l0tt0.com. All the games on my site are instant play... It's not like a lottery, more like scratch off tickets and slots.With that said, you pick 6 numbers or you can randomize it. You can bet up to 5 rows (each with 6 numbers) on each game. The winning 6 digit number (provably fair) is matched against the numbers you played. Matches are seen on the pay table (scroll down, middle tab)Pick SixHere is my latest big win!!! (and yes... I play on my own site )

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: komisariatku on November 17, 2023, 02:24:50 PMQuote from: Fivestar4everMVP on November 17, 2023, 08:56:29 AM~snip~Unfortunately I have never played the lottery and have never played in the lotto, I have seen your discussion with the lotto owner about how winnings are calculated and how that number would be a win of x10 or x1000. I see that the chance of winning x1000 or x2500 is very smallQuote from: dewez on November 06, 2023, 06:53:00 PMso if you want odds based off 0-100 percent its:2500x - 0.0001%1000x - 0.0009%Keep chasing! I'm also confused about how to guess the correct number. If I may ask, what is the minimum bet to play lottery? Maybe if we play with small bets we can guess the lottery more so the chance of winning x1000 is biggerThe minimum is $0.1 cents, but this depends on which game you are playing, like for example, if you are playing pick six, there is always an option of choosing up to five rows, where you can pick six numbers for each row, minimum bet for each of those rows is $0.1 cents, you can increase it to as high as $5 if you want.Another example is, if you are playing quick pick games, you have the option of choosing any number from 00 to 49, you can choose as many numbers as you want, but minimum bet for each number you choose is $0.1 cents, but again, you can increase this to as high as $5 if you want.I hope the explanation is understandable as possible, incase you are still lost, feel free to ask.

to x3000 but have stopped playing there because they don't feature the buy in bonus and games can get very boring there without giving you the bonus for thousand spins sometimes,so yeah I have been there near the top prize.The slots have nothing to do with numbers you say but they are based on numbers as a RNG-random number generator decides the outcome of each spin.

comments.author: Wakate
comments.body: Quote from: angrybirdy on November 17, 2023, 01:17:14 PMQuote from: wallet4bitcoin on November 17, 2023, 12:06:11 PMNever won any before, but been close to winning is still an anticipation. However, I've been close to friends who won loads of bets and it's actually part of the triggers that got me involved in gambling. I consider winning a 'luck' but you have to be guided, with the winners I got around me, I'm hoping to win anytime soon but I'm very careful not to get addicted to gambling.I realized that I have the same situation like yours, I rarely won in gambling activities but I've been so close in winning, so I guess I'm not that lucky when it comes to gambling activity, but I'm winning in a raffle so many times wherein there's no money/payment is involve, like totally winning for free. even though I rarely win, I'm still playing out of fun when I have my free time, So that I don't get obsessed with playing it.  It is good when we observe ourselves and see where we are good in so that we can make better improvements. If you know you are not good in gambling or a particular type of betting or games, it will better we switch to other games that would aid our winnings. Just like we know that there are many gamblers that prefer to bet on sport books than betting on Casino games. When we know where we are good and the kind of games we normally get luck, it is good when we focus on what works for us than running from one bet to the other.
